# Data Collection Modernization (DCM)
#### Request for Information and Invitation to Qualify
================================.OUTLINE================================رخ posefacts juris    mutate

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is issuing a Request for Information (RFI) for Data Collection Modernization (DCM). This RFI is to announce the outcome of the Invitation to Qualify (ITQ) Phase 2 59017-23-0003/C (Solicitation Number: WS41050459039) for DCM.

### Notification Details

- **Notification Reference:** WS4105045039-Doc4535027372
- **Notified Date:** 12 April 2024
- **Notification Closing Date:** 31 December 2024
- **Selection Criteria:** Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

### Invitation to Qualify (ITQ) Details

- **Solicitation Number:** WS41050459039
- **Notification Number:** WS4105045039
- **Phase:** ITQ Phase 2

### Contractor and End-User Information

- **Contracting Entity:** Public Services and Procurement Canada
- **Contracting Entity Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5
- **End User Entities:** Office of the Superintendent of Financial Institutions (OSFI)
- **End User Entities Address:** 255 Albert Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A0H2, Canada

### Additional Information
The modernization of the data collection is part of a comprehensive effort to consolidate and automate data collection processes, enhancing the overall performance and efficiency of the data collection.

#### Contact

- **Contact Name:** Melanie Beauvais-Lefort
- **Contact Email:** [melanie.beauvaislefort@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:melanie.beauvaislefort@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

Note: The provided specs list has been converted into Markdown format with added headings for the purpose of making the text more readable and organized. The text has been rewritten to improve clarity and grammar, while avoiding wordiness, adhering to the provided 400-word limit.
